get.description: Returns a list of objects representing hosts involved in Playbook runs. Unless restricted using filters the resources spread across multiple Playbook runs. No merging or deduplication is performed by this resource - i.e. if a host X is involved in playbook runs A and B then two subresources with exist, one representing X running A and one for B.
get.summary: List hosts involved in Playbook runs

get.description: Returns a list of Playbook runs for the given account. The list can be filtered using the `filter` parameter. The fields returned in the representation can be controller using `fields` parameter.
